page.title: 01DUNTON GREEN & CHEVENING
page.content: The area contains 2 main elements- 1){North Downs}:chalk scarp 210-110m. with scattered housing/woods/farmland 2){Vale of Holmesdale}:gault clay,open valley of the River Darent. The land cover is of 2 main types: A){Farmland}:2-15 acres fields,bounded by hedges/ditches & including woods. B){Residential}:areas of Dunton Green, Chevening,Chipstead & Otford. Dunton Green grew in C19th with brick works & railway construction, C20th with tileworks and local industry. Chevening has remained a hamlet around the C16th estate of Chevening Park. Otford is an old village expanded by London commuters.Clay/gravel pits form lakes for watersports & bird reserves. Transport's influence:London-coast A21 route ;railways to 2 London termini; local by-pass;M25/26 London M-Ring
